channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Colombian Fishers Are Leading The Charge In Shark Conservation
item.description: What if the people who once caught sharks became the ones ensuring their survival? In Colombia, coastal fishers who grew up seeing scalloped hammerhea...

item.title: How A Bespoke Rolls-Royce Ghost Pays Homage To Video-Game Culture
item.description: Unfortunately it takes way more than a quarter to get in on the action.

item.title: Stuut raises $29.5 million Series A led by Andreessen Horowitz to automate accounts receivable
item.description: Stuut has raised a $29.5 million Series A, led by Andreessen Horowitz, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.title: Walmart's strong quarter shows Americans are still spending
item.description: Walmart beats Wall Street expectations with strong food and health sales driving 6% revenue growth to $179.5 billion, raising outlook for fiscal 2026.

item.title: More Big Tech company debt ‘would increase the macro risks associated with the AI build-out,’ Goldman Sachs warns
item.description: Amazon, Google, Meta, Microsoft, and Oracle have taken on $121 billion in new debt, year-to-date—quadruple the amount from the prior five years.

item.title: Apple Shopping Event Promises Gift Cards Up To $250 Starting Black Friday
item.description: Apple annual shopping event, timed to run from Black Friday to Cyber Monday, offers gift cards when you buy an eligible product.

item.title: Creativity is as important as data literacy in the AI era, says IBM exec
item.description: Human ingenuity and a willingness to experiment are now vital for advancing in the AI economy.

item.title: You Can Now Get ChatGPT Plus For Free, If You Meet This Criteria
item.description: OpenAI just announced a free version of ChatGPT called ChatGPT for Teachers. Learn about AI upskilling courses, and how it will shape your job as an e...

item.title: How ‘Spoofing’ Is Diverting Russian Missiles Into Empty Fields
item.description: Ukraine's Night Watch unit is spoofing the navigation systems of Russian hypersonic Kinzhal missiles and decoying them away from targets.

item.title: Tariff threats and Gen Z sobriety have put winemakers in Bordeaux on red alert
item.description: French wine production has plummeted to 60-year lows, as trade wars and changing drinking habits hurt sales.

item.title: Johor is building a 7300-acre innovation hub on the Singapore border, offering ‘land and scale’ for its neighbor’s ‘capital and speed’
item.description: Johor doesn't have the building blocks for innovation, Datuk Syed Mohamed Syed Ibrahim, JCorp's CEO, explained. “But in Singapore, there are.”

item.title: Nike struggles are showing as its stock enters a so-called 'death cross'
Bitcoin’s bear market is dragging the crypto below $90,000
IBM and Cisco say they will try to build a quantum network
‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
Elon Musk predicts work will be 'optional' in coming decades
item.description: Elon Musk predicted AI and robotics will make work optional within 10 to 20 years, and compared future employment to playing sports or growing vegetab...

item.title: How will Nvidia spend a possible $500 billion in cash?
Trump team pledges to drive beef prices down by 2026 as USDA chief pushes back on $10-per-pound warning
item.description: President Trump is "hyper-focused" on bringing beef prices down and bringing relief to America's cattle ranchers, according to Agriculture Secretary B...

item.title: Bessent warns 'perfect storm' brewing for beef prices, details Trump's $2,000 plan for working families
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent warns of a "perfect storm" brewing with Biden-era inflation and tariff solutions, as the Trump administration conside...

item.title: Google to invest $40B in Texas data centers in major AI push
item.description: Google plans a $40 billion Texas data center investment, creating thousands of jobs as tech companies compete for AI infrastructure capacity.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
